=================
### Tender Notice

### Notice Title

#### *Procurement of Performance Measurement Consultant for Indigenous Skills and Employment Training Programme*

#### *Marché pour l’Expert-conseil en mesure du rendement pour le Programme de formation pour les compétences et l’emploi destiné aux Autochtones*

### Tender Reference

* **Reference Number**: cb-6696-55918874
* **Solicitation Number**: 100022700B

### Tender Status

This tender is *expired*, and therefore, no new bids will be accepted.

### Tender Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-07-24
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-31
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)

### Background

Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking the services of a Performance Measurement Consultant to review and evaluate the (Indigenous Skills and Employment Training) ISET performance measurement approach. The goal is to ensure that this approach effectively supports assessing and reporting on program impacts and progress towards reducing skills and employment gaps.

### Objectives

The successful bidder will be required to:

* Review the current ISET performance measurement approach
* Identify recommendations for analysis, measurement, and future reporting
* Provide data collection and analysis methods to better identify and communicate impacts
* Evaluate the work of the ISET Indigenous service delivery network in First Nations, Métis, Inuit, and Urban/Non-affiliated community members

### Tender Requirements

The tender requirements and evaluation criteria are outlined in the attached tender package, available in English and French.
